What digital services will be public.
And which digital service will be run by one or two commercial companies?
That's probably the biggest policy issue that I think you're going to have to resolve in the next couple of years, and it is going private right now.
And when it goes private, it doesn't go in this competitive way.
It goes towards monopoly.
If you can get one or two companies to go into a particular area that will dominate it.

So public I suggest is the way to go, but right now it's going.
